text: "Cool World" is a 1981 song by Australian pop rock band Mondo Rock and is the second single from their second studio album Chemistry. It went to number 8 in Australia. == Track listing == AUS 7" Single Mondo Rock - Cool World (Australian Single) at Discogs UK 7" Single Mondo Rock - Cool World (UK Single) at Discogs ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Mondo Rock songs
title: Cool World (song)
